name: MineTrasher
overview: On a planet XTROM, which is very far from the earth, are many minteral-mines. In 2008 a tremble damaged many mines and malicious aliens took up residence in the caves created by the earthquakes. You are a MineTrasher who must clear aliens and boulders from the mines while collecting the diamonds there. The caves are too small for more than a single-person vehicle, you must go in alone with your flamer, collect items and flame the monsters and boulders until your ship becomes green. Then reach the next beamstation and prepare for the next cave.
